page.title: 10Gardening in N.Duffield
page.content: In North Duffield there is lots of gardening.People grow vegetables such as peas, beans,cauliflowers,potatoes, carrots,lettuces and turnips.These and fruit trees are used to supplement the diet in the home.There is market gardening where these crops are also grown only on a larger scale and when ready are sold.Small holdings are quite popular.These are fairly large plots of land where livestock are grazed on crops grown.Most of the surrounding land is heavily farmed with chemicals which kills off many insects.Some scientists are worried about the affects the chemicals will have on the food chains if they are over used.The land on which North Duffield is is very marshy with lots of dykes around.the insect, animal and plantlife can easily be affected if too many chemicals are used.
